text: SRC-related proto-oncogenes and transcription factors in primary human T cells : modulation by cyclosporin A and FK506 .
Activation of T lymphocytes induces transcription of genes encoding for lymphokines .

text: However , CsA and FK506 inhibit the appearance of DNA binding activity of factors that bind to the NF-AT and AP-1 sites in the <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> enhancer .

Since the induction of NF-AT and AP-1 is induced by the same stimuli that stimulate <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> production , these results indicate that the immunosuppressant action of CsA and FK506 is exerted at the level of these trans - activating factors .
